季節性情動障害: (きせつせいじょうどうしょうがい) - Seasonal Affective Disorder; SAD
季節感: (きせつかん) - a sense of the seasons
季節柄: (きせつがら) - in these times; in times likes these; the season being what it is
季節調整: (きせつちょうせい) - seasonal adjustment
季節調整済み: (きせつちょうせいずみ) - seasonally adjusted
季題: (きだい) - seasonal word (in haiku); seasonal topic (in haiku)/seasonal word used as a theme (at a haiku gathering)
孤剣: (こけん) - sole sword; unarmed but for a sword
孤城: (こじょう) - solitary castle; isolated castle
孤城落日: (こじょうらくじつ) - (yoji) feeling (looking) lone and helpless; helplessness of those in reduced circumstances
孤弱: (こじゃく) - young orphan; being alone and weak with no place to go to
孤影悄然: (こえいしょうぜん) - lonely figure
孤独感: (こどくかん) - sense of isolation; (feelings of) loneliness
孤独死: (こどくし) - dying alone (esp. of someone who lives alone and dies of natural causes at home without anyone knowing); solitary death
孤立: (koritsu) - isolamento, estar sozinho, estar sem amigos
孤立の姿: (こりつのすがた) - state of isolation
孤立感: (こりつかん) - isolation; sense of isolation; feeling of being isolated
孤立死: (こりつし) - dying alone (esp. of someone who lives alone and dies of natural causes at home without anyone knowing); solitary death
孤立無援: (こりつむえん) - (yoji) being isolated and helpless; fighting (struggling) alone and unassisted
孤立語: (こりつご) - isolating language; isolated language; isolated word
孤立電子対: (こりつでんしつい) - lone pair (of electrons)
孤絶: (こぜつ) - to become isolated; to become separated
孤雁: (こがん) - solitary wild goose (i.e. separated from its flock, esp. flying)
学: (gaku/mana) - study , learning, scholarship, study, erudition, knowledge, education; study of ..., -ology, -ics
学がある: (がくがある) - to have learning; to be educated
学が有る: (がくがある) - to have learning; to be educated
学の独立: (がくのどくりつ) - freedom of learning
学び取る: (まなびとる) - to collect information; to gather knowledge
学び直す: (まなびなおす) - to relearn; to brush up
学び舎: (まなびや) - school; school building; schoolhouse
学ぶ: (まなぶ) - to study (in depth); to learn; to take lessons in
学らん: (がくらん) - school uniform for boys, often with stand-up collar, long jacket and loose trousers
学を修める: (がくをおさめる) - to pursue knowledge (one's studies)
学を窮める: (がくをきわめる) - to study exhaustively
学ラン: (がくラン) - school uniform for boys, often with stand-up collar, long jacket and loose trousers
学会: (がっかい) - scientific society; academic meeting; academic conference
学位を授ける: (がくいをさずける) - to award a degree
学位記: (がくいき) - diploma; testamur; graduation certificate
学債: (がくさい) - school bond or debenture
学僧: (がくそう) - learned priest pursuing his studies
学制: (がくせい) - educational or school system
学力: (がくりょく) - scholarly ability; scholarship; knowledge; literary ability
学力低下: (がくりょくていか) - decline in academic ability; decline in academic performance
学匠: (がくしょう) - scholar; person studying Buddhism
学協会: (がくきょうかい) - study society; academic society
学参: (がくさん) - study reference; study-aid book
学友会: (がくゆうかい) - students' association; alumni association
学名: (がくめい) - technical name (often the internationally accepted Latin, scientific, or Linnaean name of plants and animals)
学問に王道なし: (がくもんにおうどうなし) - there are no shortcuts in learning
学問の奨め: (がくもんのすすめ) - encouragement of learning
学問所: (がくもんじょ) - place of study; school
